thread.title: US weather: Man trapped in tree rescued from raging river
thread.title_full: US weather: Man trapped in tree rescued from raging river

author: Ava
title: US weather: Man trapped in tree rescued from raging river
text:
???? A man trapped in a tree is rescued from the raging river below. He had called firefighters from the tree, but his phone battery ran out before he was able to say where he was. Rescuers were able to geolocate him using the phone.
#Tree #Trapped #Rescue #River #Weather #Flooding #Firefighters #UnitedStates #Geolocate #Shorts
